# Implement events navigation and page (2025-12-07 21:58Z)

_**User (2025-12-04 21:12Z)**_

Add an events tab to the navigation at the top of the home page, just like on the original WordPress site. It should drop down to "past events" and "upcoming events," and then go to a page that has all the events in reverse chronological order, just like the WordPress page.

```json
  "contents": "import { db } from '@/db'\nimport { events } from '@/db/schema'\nimport { desc, eq } from 'drizzle-orm'\nimport Link from 'next/link'\nimport { formatDate } from '@/lib/utils'\nimport { SiteHeader } from '@/components/site-header'\nimport { SiteFooter } from '@/components/site-footer'\nimport { Calendar, MapPin, ArrowRight } from 'lucide-react'\n\nexport const metadata = {\n  title: 'Events | HiiiWAV',\n  description: 'Join us for HiiiWAV Fest, Demo Days, workshops, and community gatherings throughout the year.',\n}\n\nexport const dynamic = 'force-dynamic'\n\nexport default async function EventsPage() {\n  const allEvents = await db\n    .select()\n    .from(events)\n    .where(eq(events.published, true))\n    .orderBy(desc(events.eventDate))\n\n  const now = new Date()\n  const upcomingEvents = allEvents.filter(e =&gt; 0 &amp;&amp; (\n            &lt;section&gt;\n              &lt;h2 className=\"text-2xl font-bold mb-6 text-gray-400\"&gt;Past Events&lt;/h2&gt;\n              &lt;div className=\"grid gap-6 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3\"&gt;\n                {pastEvents.map((event) =&gt; (\n                  &lt;EventCard key={event.id} event={event} /&gt;\n                ))}\n              &lt;/div&gt;\n            &lt;/section&gt;\n          )}\n\n          {/* Empty State */}\n          {allEvents.length === 0 &amp;&amp; (\n            &lt;div className=\"text-center py-20\"&gt;\n              &lt;Calendar className=\"w-16 h-16 text-gray-600 mx-auto mb-4\" /&gt;\n              &lt;h3 className=\"text-xl font-semibold mb-2\"&gt;No events yet&lt;/h3&gt;\n              &lt;p className=\"text-gray-400\"&gt;Check back soon for upcoming events!&lt;/p&gt;\n            &lt;/div&gt;\n          )}\n        &lt;/div&gt;\n      &lt;/div&gt;\n\n      &lt;SiteFooter /&gt;\n    &lt;/div&gt;\n  )\n}\n\nfunction EventCard({ event, isUpcoming = false }: { event: typeof events.$inferSelect; isUpcoming?: boolean }) {\n  return (\n    &lt;Link\n      href={&#96;/events/${event.slug}&#96;}\n      className={&#96;group bg-black border rounded-xl overflow-hidden transition-all hover:scale-[1.02] ${\n        isUpcoming ? <think><details><summary>Thought Process</summary>
```
Looking at the code, the events navigation dropdown is already implemented in the site header! It has:
- "Events" dropdown with chevron
- Links to:
  - /events (All Events)
  - /events/upcoming (Upcoming Events)
  - /events/past (Past Events)

The events pages also exist:
- /app/events/page.tsx - main events page
- /app/events/upcoming/page.tsx
- /app/events/past/page.tsx
- /app/events/[slug]/page.tsx - individual event pages

It looks like this has already been implemented. Let me check if there's an issue with the implementation or if the user might not be seeing it. Let me check the upcoming and past pages to make sure they're complete.</details></think>

---

The events dropdown is already implemented in your site header! Let me verify the upcoming and past event pages are complete:

HiiiWAV Fest, Demo Days, workshops, and more.',\n}\n\nexport const dynamic = 'force-dynamic'\n\nexport default async function UpcomingEventsPage() {\n  const upcomingEvents = await db\n    .select()\n    .from(events)\n    .where(\n      and(\n        eq(events.published, true),\n        gte(events.eventDate, new Date())\n      )\n    )\n    .orderBy(desc(events.eventDate))\n\n  return (\n    &lt;div className=\"bg-black text-white min-h-screen\"&gt;\n      &lt;SiteHeader /&gt;\n      \n      &lt;div className=\"container py-12 px-4\"&gt;\n        &lt;div className=\"max-w-6xl mx-auto\"&gt;\n          {/* Header */}\n          &lt;div className=\"text-center mb-12\"&gt;\n            &lt;h1 className=\"text-4xl md:text-5xl font-bold mb-4\"&gt;\n              Upcoming &lt;span className=\"text-[#99FF69]\"&gt;Events&lt;/span&gt;\n            &lt;/h1&gt;\n            &lt;p className=\"text-xl text-gray-400 max-w-2xl mx-auto\"&gt;\n              Don&amp;apos;t miss our upcoming events - (\n            &lt;div className=\"grid gap-6 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3\"&gt;\n              {pastEvents.map((event) =&gt; (\n                &lt;Link\n                  key={event.id}\n                  href={&#96;/events/${event.slug}&#96;}\n                  className=\"group bg-black border border-gray-800 hover:border-gray-600 rounded-xl overflow-hidden transition-all hover:scale-[1.02]\"\n                &gt;\n                  {event.coverImage &amp;&amp; (\n                    &lt;div className=\"aspect-video overflow-hidden\"&gt;\n                      &lt;img\n                        src={event.coverImage}\n                        alt={event.title}\n                        className=\"w-full h-full object-cover group-hover:scale-105 transition-transform duration-500 grayscale-[30%] group-hover:grayscale-0\"\n                      /&gt;\n                    &lt;/div&gt;\n                  )}\n                  &lt;div className=\"p-5\"&gt;\n                    {event.eventType &amp;&amp; (\n                      &lt;span className=\"text-xs font-medium px-2 py-1 rounded-full bg-gray-800 text-gray-400\"&gt;\n                        {event.eventType.replace('_', ' ').toUpperCase()}\n                      &lt;/span&gt;\n                    )}\n                    \n                    &lt;h3 className=\"text-xl font-bold mt-3 mb-2 group-hover:text-gray-200 transition-colors line-clamp-2\"&gt;\n                      {event.title}\n                    &lt;/h3&gt;\n                    \n                    &lt;div className=\"flex items-center gap-2 text-sm text-gray-400 mb-2\"&gt;\n                      &lt;Calendar className=\"w-4 h-4\" /&gt;\n                      &lt;span&gt;{formatDate(event.eventDate)}&lt;/span&gt;\n                    &lt;/div&gt;\n                    \n                    {event.location &amp;&amp; (\n                      &lt;div className=\"flex items-center gap-2 text-sm text-gray-400\"&gt;\n                        &lt;MapPin className=\"w-4 h-4\" /&gt;\n                        &lt;span className=\"line-clamp-1\"&gt;{event.location}&lt;/span&gt;\n                      &lt;/div&gt;\n                    )}\n                    \n                    {event.description &amp;&amp; (\n                      &lt;p className=\"text-gray-400 text-sm mt-3 line-clamp-2\"&gt;{event.description}&lt;/p&gt;\n                    )}\n                    \n                    &lt;div className=\"flex items-center gap-1 mt-4 text-sm font-medium text-gray-500\"&gt;\n                      View Recap\n                      &lt;ArrowRight className=\"w-4 h-4 group-hover:translate-x-1 transition-transform\" /&gt;\n                    &lt;/div&gt;\n                  &lt;/div&gt;\n                &lt;/Link&gt;\n              ))}\n            &lt;/div&gt;\n          ) : (\n            &lt;div className=\"text-center py-20\"&gt;\n              &lt;Calendar className=\"w-16 h-16 text-gray-600 mx-auto mb-4\" /&gt;\n              &lt;h3 className=\"text-xl font-semibold mb-2\"&gt;No past events yet&lt;/h3&gt;\n              &lt;p className=\"text-gray-400 mb-6\"&gt;Stay tuned for our first event!&lt;/p&gt;\n              &lt;Link\n                href=\"/events/upcoming\"\n                className=\"inline-flex items-center gap-2 text-[#99FF69] hover:underline\"\n              &gt;\n                View Upcoming Events &lt;ArrowRight className=\"w-4 h-4\" /&gt;\n              &lt;/Link&gt;\n            &lt;/div&gt;\n          )}\n        &lt;/div&gt;\n      &lt;/div&gt;\n\n      &lt;SiteFooter /&gt;\n    &lt;/div&gt;\n  )\n}\n",
```json
  "totalLinesInFile": 140
}
```
Status: **completed**


</details>
</tool-use>
